name: Haldor
description: Haldor - game about the same name character. Plunge into the exciting soul-like rpg. Try your hand at becoming the revenge of the ancient Scandinavian warrior.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel® Pentium® E5300 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 3.9GHz/8GT/s/3MB Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 420gt DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
